overview:
Neil Chandran is a practicing investment consultant. Neil Chandran offer sound advice on securities- stocks/bonds/derivatives for retirement income, asset protection and growth and insurance. I am building my practice to protect your capital, put a safety net around it, generate income, grow it, keep it liquid and minimize taxes. Neil Chandran will be certified soon.

25 years of progressive, international experience, with a sub 10 years of intense experience in

Managing performance improvement programs, projects and outsourcing engagements. Directing several performance improvement curriculum. Organizing projects, project teams and conducting gap analysis. Planning for change strategies, generating plan options, work streams and engagement pipeline.
